snippet: After being hired 13 games into the season, Ken Hitchcock has coached St. Louis to the top of the Western Conference and has them in contention for first place in overall points.
lead_paragraph: After being hired 13 games into the season, Ken Hitchcock has coached St. Louis to the top of the Western Conference and has them in contention for first place in overall points.

headline.seo: Ken Hitchcock Rethinks Ways and Rejuvenates Blues Takes Blues to Top of the N.H.L.
headline.main: Hitchcock Rethinks His Ways and Rejuvenates the Blues
headline.print_headline: Hitchcock Rethinks His Ways and Rejuvenates the Blues
